description: These delicious vegan-friendly blueberry muffins are perfect for a breakfast on the go, a morning or afternoon snack, or a lunchbox treat.
name: Vegan Blueberry Muffins Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Divide mixture among pan holes. Bake for 18 minutes or until golden and muffins spring back when lightly touched. Transfer to a wire rack to cool. Serve.
